name: ollama-amd-openwebui.dnp.dappnode.eth
description:
Run large language models locally on your DAppNode with GPU acceleration. This package combines Ollama (with AMD ROCm support for GPU inference) and Open WebUI (a ChatGPT-like interface) to provide a complete local AI solution.

**Features:**
- AMD GPU acceleration via ROCm
- ChatGPT-like web interface
- Complete privacy - all processing stays local
- Support for multiple LLM models (Llama, Mistral, CodeLlama, etc.)

**Requirements:**
- AMD GPU with ROCm support
- At least 8GB RAM (16GB+ recommended)
- Sufficient storage for models (10GB+ recommended)
